isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - INSTALL - INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 91
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, install inner cab door control rod (Item 3) with the spring (Item 4) into slotted hole of inner cab door handle (Item 1), then install inner cab door control rod (Item 2) onto inner cab door handle, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 81
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para:
Install inner cab door handle control rods (Items 2 and 5, Figure 90)
through the opening from the front side of the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 90)
and slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the left until the inner cab door handle is positioned over the window regulator assembly , driver side shown.

Position both retaining tabs (Item 3) on the inner cab door handle (Item 2) into the slots in the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and slide inner cab door handle to the left to secure retaining tabs in place, driver side shown.

Once the inner cab door handle (Item 2) is positioned properly. Install hex bolt (Item 1) securing inner cab door handle to the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown. Tighten to 71 to 88.5 lbf-in (8 to 10 N•m).

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 90
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) laying on it's front, install inner cab door control rod (Item 2) with the spring (Item 3) into retaining clip (Item 4). Make sure the spring is to the right of the retaining clip, driver side shown.

With the front cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 72)
placed on a suitable work surface. Install outer cab door handle and cab door latch as follows.

Install front cab door latch, refer to CAB DOOR LATCH
. For installing front cab door latch, refer to Install Front Cab Door Latch on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

Install front cab door outer cab door handle, refer to OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE
. For installing front cab door outer cab door handle, refer to Install Front Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

Install front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For installing front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Install Front Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

Install front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

Install front cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door inner cab door handle.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:

for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, install inner cab door control rod (Item 3) with the spring (Item 4) into slotted hole of inner cab door handle (Item 1), then install inner cab door control rod (Item 2) onto inner cab door handle, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:

through the opening from the front side of the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 90)
and slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the left until the inner cab door handle is positioned over the window regulator assembly , driver side shown.

Position both retaining tabs (Item 3) on the inner cab door handle (Item 2) into the slots in the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and slide inner cab door handle to the left to secure retaining tabs in place, driver side shown.

Once the inner cab door handle (Item 2) is positioned properly. Install hex bolt (Item 1) securing inner cab door handle to the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown. Tighten to 71 to 88.5 lbf-in (8 to 10 N•m).

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 90
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) laying on it's front, install inner cab door control rod (Item 2) with the spring (Item 3) into retaining clip (Item 4). Make sure the spring is to the right of the retaining clip, driver side shown.

With the rear cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 74)
placed on a suitable work surface. Install outer cab door handle and cab door latch as follows.

Install rear cab door latch, refer to CAB DOOR LATCH
. For installing rear cab door latch, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Latch on Crew Cab for all Models.

Install rear cab door outer cab door handle, refer to OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE
. For installing rear cab door outer cab door handle, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for all Models.

Install rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For installing rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Crew Cab for all Models.

Install rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for all Models.

Install rear cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side rear cab door inner cab door handle.
